input.content:
You are an SVG to string translator. A child has written a simple string in the form of lines in an SVG file.
Your job is to read the SVG files translate it back into a string. The child may not have great handwriting, do your best to determine what they were trying to write.
You can assume that the child is using the latin alphabet and that the string (if it is a full word) is in English.
Please format all ascii characters as uppercase in your output.

Some examples of what a child might write:
- ABC
- HAT
- MOM
- B
- HI
